body_html:
I'm sorry the initial advice was the other way around, but we had some more discussions about this and we're very certain that we do not want to make this easy. It's a bad idea (tm), take it from people who have lost lots of work to easy overwriting.

You can always emulate the behavior by doing the delete_recursively manually, but that I would advise against. Ideally, timestamp your directories and symlink the latest.
